name: Opinion Stage
description: Opinion Stage is a platform for creating interactive quizzes, polls, surveys, and forms to boost engagement and gather insights.
longDescription: Opinion Stage is an interactive content creation service designed to help publishers, brands, and marketers create engaging quizzes, polls, surveys, and forms. Its mission is to drive higher user engagement and collect valuable insights through visually appealing, user-friendly tools. The platform supports businesses, non-profits, and individuals by offering customizable templates and real-time analytics to enhance audience interaction. It is used by over 100,000 content creators worldwide, including top brands and publishers, to generate leads, increase traffic, and extract actionable data. The intuitive no-code interface allows users to create branded experiences quickly, making it accessible for users without technical expertise. Opinion Stage also integrates with platforms like WordPress, enabling seamless embedding of interactive content on websites.
features: Create engaging quizzes, polls, and surveys with a no-code, user-friendly interface to boost audience interaction.
Use AI-powered tools to generate professional quizzes and surveys in minutes based on a topic or goal.
Customize[...,]Customize every detail, including colors, fonts, and logos, to align with your brand’s identity.
Access real-time analytics and insights to track user responses and campaign performance instantly.
Embed interactive content easily on websites with straightforward integration, including WordPress plugins.
Generate up to 5x more leads by embedding lead capture forms within quizzes or surveys.
Support for multiple question formats, such as multiple-choice, checkboxes, and open-ended questions, for versatile content creation.
Optimize content for all devices, ensuring a seamless user experience across desktops and mobiles.
Use skip logic and personalization to create dynamic, conversational surveys that improve completion rates.
Leverage pre-designed templates or AI to create quizzes and surveys quickly from scratch.
Receive up to 25 responses per month with the free plan, with options to upgrade for advanced features like white labeling.

faqs.question: What is Opinion Stage used for?
faqs.answer: Opinion Stage is a platform for creating interactive quizzes, polls, surveys, and forms to engage audiences and collect insights.

faqs.question: Is there a free plan available?
faqs.answer: Yes, Opinion Stage offers a free plan with unlimited items and up to 25 responses per month, with access to core features like AI quiz creation.

faqs.question: Can I customize the look of my quizzes and surveys?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can fully customize colors, fonts, logos, and CSS to match your brand’s identity.

faqs.question: Does Opinion Stage support WordPress integration?
faqs.answer: Yes, Opinion Stage provides a WordPress plugin for easy embedding of polls, quizzes, and surveys on your website.

faqs.question: What kind of analytics does Opinion Stage provide?
faqs.answer: The platform offers real-time analytics to track user responses, participation rates, and campaign performance.

faqs.question: Can I use Opinion Stage to generate leads?
faqs.answer: Yes, embedding lead capture forms in quizzes or surveys can generate up to 5x more leads compared to standard forms.

faqs.question: Is coding knowledge required to use Opinion Stage?
faqs.answer: No, the platform is designed to be no-code and user-friendly, requiring no technical expertise.

faqs.question: What types of questions can I include in surveys?
faqs.answer: Opinion Stage supports multiple-choice, checkbox, open-answer, Likert scale, and essay question formats.
